name: Pizza
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 200°C. 2. Spread tomato sauce on dough. 3. Add cheese and pepperoni. 4. Bake for 15-20 minutes.

name: Salad
instructions: 1. Chop lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumber. 2. Mix in a bowl. 3. Add olive oil and vinegar. 4. Toss to combine.

name: Sweet Potato
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Slice sweet potatoes. 3. Toss with olive oil and salt. 4. Bake for 25-30 minutes.

name: Gnocchi
instructions: 1. Boil gnocchi until they float. 2. Drain and add tomato sauce. 3. Top with Parmesan cheese. 4. Serve hot.

name: Pot Roast
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 160°C. 2. Sear roast in a pan. 3. Place in roasting pan with vegetables and broth. 4. Cover and cook for 3-4 hours.

name: Lasagna
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C. 2. Layer noodles, ricotta, sauce, and beef in a baking dish. 3. Top with mozzarella. 4. Bake for 45 minutes.

name: Hamburger
instructions: 1. Form beef into patties. 2. Cook patties on a grill. 3. Assemble with buns, lettuce, tomato, and cheese. 4. Serve hot.

name: Pad Thai
instructions: 1. Cook noodles. 2. Stir-fry shrimp and eggs. 3. Add noodles, sauce, and bean sprouts. 4. Top with peanuts.

name: Sarma
instructions: 1. Mix beef, rice, and onions. 2. Wrap in cabbage leaves. 3. Cook in tomato sauce for 1 hour.

name: Bacon
instructions: 1. Cook bacon in a pan until crispy. 2. Serve hot.

name: Hot Dog
instructions: 1. Cook hot dog. 2. Place in bun. 3. Add condiments. 4. Serve hot.

name: Chocolate Cake
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 175°C. 2. Mix ingredients. 3. Pour into a baking pan. 4. Bake for 30-35 minutes.

name: Wheat Bread
instructions: 1. Mix ingredients. 2. Knead dough. 3. Let rise. 4. Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.
